ImageManager.preloadEventImg(this);
1.演者の初期配置
2.演出開始

King Agnos: It seems there is no falsehood in the title of
the Sword of Atu, which you are rumored to be.

King Agnos: Not only did you prevent the attack of the devil
worshippers, but you also saved my relative, Pilia. I
express my gratitude for that.

Imperial Army Soldier Atu: It is an honor, your words are
too kind.

King Agnos: It seems I must reward you in some way, if you
are indeed the Sword of the Empire...

King Agnos: What do you think of the title 'Shield of the
Empire'?

King Agnos: Hahaha, it seems that your mind doesn't work
well outside of battle. I am saying that I want to welcome
you as a royal guard.

Imperial Army Soldier Atu: It is an honor beyond measure!
Please use me as the shield of the royal family, as the
sword of the royal family!

By chance, Atu saved King Agnos. This was a fateful
encounter that would greatly change Atu's destiny. From this
day forward, Atu would act together with King Agnos.

King Agnos and Atu got along well and had great
compatibility. King Agnos, who was filled with passion, and
Atu, who realized that passion. The two of them would go on
to suppress numerous rebellions within the empire.

Atu received overwhelming support from the soldiers on the
battlefield. Their brave and fearless demeanor, coupled with
a lively and charming personality, made them an admired
figure among the troops. The ability to overturn enemy
strategies with tactical prowess was a source of inspiration
for the soldiers.

In the empire, there was a custom of calling the king the
father of the imperial citizens. Following that tradition,
Atu came to be called the elder brother of the empire. For
many imperial citizens, Atu was a living hero.

Many nobles and members of the Senate viewed Atu's existence
as a threat, but they couldn't lay a hand on King Agnos'
favorite. Eventually, Atu would be bestowed with the
position of general by King Agnos.

If there is any misfortune for Atu, it would be becoming a
general without much experience in political maneuvering
under the protection of King Agnos. This would later become
evident as a significant difference between Atu and Caron
and the others.
イベント終了用
dobby_dispchara clear
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
